title: Measurements and Units - Grade 6
content:
# Measurements and Units - Grade 6

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Understand the fundamental concepts of Length, Mass, Time, Temperature, SI Units
- Apply scientific principles to real-world situations
- Analyze and interpret scientific data related to Measurements and Units

## Introduction
This lesson explores Measurements and Units, focusing on Length, Mass, Time, Temperature, SI Units. Students will learn through hands-on activities,
demonstrations, and practical applications relevant to Sri Lankan context.

## Main Content
This section covers Length, Mass, Time, Temperature, SI Units. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Key Concepts
Length, Mass, Time

## Activities
1. Laboratory experiment demonstrating L
2. Group discussion on applications in Sri Lanka
3. Problem-solving exercises
4. Real-world case studies

## Assessment
Students will be assessed through practical work, written tests, and project presentations.

## Resources
- Textbook: Science for Grade 6 (Sri Lankan Curriculum)
- Laboratory equipment
- Digital resources and simulations
learning_outcomes: Analyze concepts related to Measurements and Units
